title: Drug Repurposing Data Schema
description: Schema for validating drug-disease pair data for repurposing prioritization

drugDiseasePairs.description: Array of drug-disease pair candidates for repurposing

drugDiseasePair.description: A single drug-disease pair with associated prioritization metrics

id.description: Unique identifier for the drug-disease pair

drugNdcCode.description: National Drug Code (NDC) for the drug

diseaseOntologyTerm.description: Ontology term identifier for the disease (e.g., MONDO ID)

biologicalSuitability.description: Score for biological plausibility and mechanism of action (0-10 scale)

unmetMedicalNeed.description: Score for severity and availability of treatments (0-10 scale)

economicSuitability.description: Score for development costs and economic feasibility (0-10 scale)

marketSize.description: Score for patient population and market potential (0-10 scale)

competitiveAdvantage.description: Score for uniqueness versus existing therapies (0-10 scale)

regulatoryFeasibility.description: Score for regulatory pathway and approval likelihood (0-10 scale)

clinicalRisk.description: Score for safety concerns and trial failure risk (0-10 scale, lower is better)

compositePrioritizationScore.description: Overall prioritization score (composite of all metrics)

narrative.description: Detailed narrative explaining the repurposing rationale
